yoga_pants.name: Yoga Pants
yoga_pants.description: A must for yoga, running and beyond.

Dri_fit.name: Dri-fit shirt
Dri_fit.description: The only way to workout is to have the sweat wick away.

Running_Shoes.name: Running shoes
Running_Shoes.description: A necessity to blaze a trail.

Teva_Flipflops.name: Teva Flipflops
Teva_Flipflops.description: Some people prefer their toes open free.

Toes_Shoes.name: Toes Shoes
Toes_Shoes.description: Because sometimes, each toe needs its own home.

Sunglasses.name: Sunglasses
Sunglasses.description: Whether you're running or doing yoga outside, eyes need a shield

Dress.name: Dress
Dress.description: Nothing better for the office on a sunny warm day. Pretend you're outside.

Blazer.name: Blazer
Blazer.description: A great way to stay warm in the freezing office without wearing a coat.

Pants.name: Pants
Pants.description: Best choice when sleeping longer wins over shaving your legs.

Scarf.name: Scarf
Scarf.description: The fastest way to dress up boring business colors

Earrings.name: Earrings
Earrings.description: People look at your face first, give them something to look at.

Bracelet.name: Bracelet
Bracelet.description: A great looking accessory that can sometimes annoyingly click on the keyboard.

Wrist_Wallet.name: Wrist Wallet
Wrist_Wallet.description: For the days when you just want to run to catch the train to work.

Computer_bag.name: Computer bag
Computer_bag.description: If you have to haul it, might as well have a cute bag for it.

Purse.name: Purse
Purse.description: Sometimes, a great purse is all you need to have a good day.
